name: Feather Down Farms at Lunsford Farm

reviews.text: Had a brilliant time at the farm. The children loved it and did not want to leave.
reviews.title: Great glamping experience

reviews.text: What helped was the great weather when we were there.
reviews.title: Peaceful for parents, adventure for kids

reviews.text: The farm is a working farm in the village of Pett. It has mainly sheep.
reviews.title: Fabulous stay on this friendly farm
Superb family holiday
reviews.text: The 4 tents are about 500m away on a hill overlooking the sea. The sea is about a km away, and you can walk there on mostly farm land.

reviews.title: Lunsford Farm - absolutely fabulous in every way!
reviews.text: The tents are well-equipped with proper a double bed, two bunk beds, a cupboard bed, a proper toilet, a wood-fire stove, a tap, a dinning table, 4 chairs and 2 deck chairs.

description: Feather Down's 'farm of the year' in 2010, we have stunning views out to sea, just 10 minutes walk away. Our four tents were voted Coastal Glamping Site number one by Coast magazine.
